channel.title: Docker-compose on 风笑天的博客
channel.description: Recent content in Docker-compose on 风笑天的博客

item.title: Docker Compose 使用
item.description: 1.docker-compose的作用 2.下载安装 docker-compose会依赖一些库 1 yum install -y py-pip python-dev libffi-dev openssl-dev gcc libc-dev make 下载docker-compose 1 curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.27.4/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose 添加执行权限 1 chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose 测试 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 docker-compose version ## 显示以下信息，表明docker-compose安装完成 docker-compose version 1.26.1, build f216ddbf docker-py version: 4.2.2 CPython version: 3.7.7 OpenSSL version: OpenSSL 1.1.0l 10 Sep 2019 3.
